title: A's Kurtz, Braves' Baldwin named rookies of year
content: Athletics first baseman Nick Kurtz was selected the American League Rookie of the Year on Monday night after hitting 36 home runs with 98 RBIs in 117 games, while catcher Drake Baldwin of the Atlanta Braves took home the National League's top honors.

title: Giants fire coach Daboll; Schoen remains as GM
content: Giants coach Brian Daboll has been fired after the team blew another double-digit lead Sunday in Chicago.

title: Ortiz bail set at $500K in pitch-rigging case
content: Guardians pitcher Luis Ortiz appeared in federal court Monday on charges accusing him and teammate Emmanuel Clase of taking bribes to help associates in their native Dominican Republic win prop bets placed on pitches they threw.

title: McDermott backs Brady; not eyeing Daboll for staff
content: Bills coach Sean McDermott said Monday he was "fully confident" in offensive coordinator Joe Brady and his staff following a blowout loss to the Dolphins in Week 10.

title: Burrow back to practice, eyes Thanksgiving return
content: Bengals QB Joe Burrow, who hasn't played since Week 2 after having foot surgery, returned to practice Monday and hopes to take the field against the Ravens on Nov. 27.

title: Ravens dispute RB's false-start claim: Wasn't us
content: Ravens coach John Harbaugh disputed the assertion made by Vikings running back Aaron Jones that Baltimore had any role in Minnesota's eight false starts.

title: Source: Jets' Wilson to miss at least 3-4 weeks
content: Jets wide receiver Garrett Wilson suffered a knee sprain Sunday and is expected to miss at least three to four weeks, a source told ESPN's Rich Cimini.

title: MLB Awards Week predictions, results: Kurtz, Baldwin named Rookies of the Year
content: Baseball's best players and managers of 2025 are collecting their hardware, starting with a pair of rookies from the A's and Braves.

title: Is UNC back?! Judging six opening week overreactions
content: From the strength of this freshman class to statement wins, these are conclusions we're drawing early.

title: AP Top 25 poll reaction: UConn remains No. 1, USC climbs
content: The first in-season women's AP Top 25 poll is out. Here's what's next for every team in the standings.

title: Barnwell: The AFC is shifting, but the four new challengers to the conference throne are all flawed
content: We thought the Bills, Chiefs and Ravens would dominate the AFC again this season. But four teams have risen from the pack to challenge -- and possibly pass -- them.

title: The NHL's best this week: The future is now for Bedard, Celebrini
content: The No. 1 picks from 2023 and 2024 in the mix for the NHL's scoring lead. Plus, a look at key games coming up.

title: Potential fatal flaws that could sink 26 playoff contenders
content: Can Ohio State run enough? Will Georgia's D show up? What could trip up Indiana? We look at the best teams' weak spots.

title: How Fleetwood Mac and the USC marching band went from a missed phone call to collaborating on 'Tusk'
content: The idea initially sounded so far-fetched band directors thought it was a prank. But the collaboration became a sensation.

title: What happens next in the Clase-Ortiz pitch-rigging indictments?
content: Breaking down the details of the indictments, what's next for those involved and what this means for the MLB.

title: Best, worst of NFL Week 10: Steelers' offense crumbles, plus late meltdowns by the Jaguars and Giants
content: Our NFL Nation reporters answer the biggest questions from each game. Here's what we learned from Week 10.

title: What's at stake for every player in the WNBA labor battle
content: From stars with millions in off-court endorsements to those making the minimum, every WNBA player stands to gain in the new CBA.

title: Highlights from John Cena's farewell tour
content: Here are the best moments from John Cena's "The Last Time is Now" farewell tour, which kicked off at Intuit Dome on Jan. 6.

title: Final in the United States? What the future holds for the UEFA Champions League
content: Are future Champions League finals here to stay in Europe or is there an impending future of Europe's most prestigious club game being played abroad?

title: MLS Cup playoffs Round 1 talking points: Messi, favorites move on
content: Were there any upsets in Round 1 of the MLS Cup playoffs? Not really, but that didn't mean the best-of-three series were short on drama.

title: NFL Week 10's top performance? Check the results of this week's 'Himmy' Award
content: TreVeyon Henderson, Matthew Stafford, DeMarcus Lawrence or Jonathan Taylor -- who earned Week 10's "Himmy" Award?

title: How No. 17 Kaeli Wynn fits at South Carolina, more 2026 girls' recruit projections
content: Breaking down the fits of every top 2026 commitment, including South Carolina's latest pick-up before the early signing window.

title: Early bets for Week 11: Bengals and Dolphins to cover, plus an MVP pick
content: What lines offered immediate value once odds came out? Here are three early bets and a futures wager to track.

title: Pickups: Memphis' Edey, OKC's Mitchell among top options
content: Every week in fantasy basketball, there are available players who can help fill holes in your roster. Here are the ones to add for the week ahead.

title: Norris continues to quiet his critics with title-worthy win in Brazil
content: Critics have long questioned Lando Norris' mental fortitude. His win in Brazil should shut them up, and put the F1 title within his reach.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Liverpool eye Brighton's Minteh
content: Could Liverpool end up signing Yankuba Minteh from Brighton & Hove Albion? Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: CCTV footage shows Delhi blast suspect’s vehicle entering and exiting Red Fort area
content: In a tragic turn of events, a powerful blast shattered the calm of Delhi's Subhash Marg close to the historic Red Fort on Monday evening. The explosion, which emanated from a Hyundai i20 parked at a traffic signal, resulted in the loss of at least eight lives and left many others injured.

title: 'Toughest conversations': Gambhir breaks silence on dropping Arshdeep, Kuldeep
content: The move to rest Arshdeep Singh, India’s leading T20I wicket-taker, for the first two matches to accommodate Harshit Rana drew widespread criticism. Arshdeep made a strong comeback later in the series, picking up three wickets in the third T20I and following it with 1/22 in the fourth match.

title: Amazon’s cooling tech unveiled: CEO outlines AI plan; Elon Musk responds
content: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy unveiled the company's innovative in-house AI chip cooling system, the In-Row Heat Exchanger (IRHX). This solution allows liquid and air-cooled racks in existing data centers, boosting power efficiency by 20% and reducing water usage by 9%. Amazon aims for over 20% of its ML capacity to be liquid-cooled by 2026.

title: Texas teen who crashed car killing 6 Indians in 2023 sentenced to 65 years in prison
content: A Texas teenager, 19-year-old Luke Garrett Resecker, has received a 65-year prison sentence for a fatal 2023 crash. Driving under the influence of THC, Resecker caused a head-on collision that claimed the lives of six Indian-origin individuals. The sole survivor, Lokesh, who lost his wife, in-laws, two children and cousin, was left paralyzed.

title: ‘Don’t have notifications’: JPMorgan chief ignores most texts; keeps phone off at work
content: JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon, despite leading a massive bank, limits his phone use at work, turning off notifications and ignoring texts unless from his children. He prioritizes focus in meetings, believing distractions hinder engagement. Dimon also advocates for US schools to evolve, integrating crucial skills like coding and cybersecurity to prepare students for the modern workforce.

title: 'Don't see any reason': Sourav Ganguly slams Team India selectors over Shami snub
content: "Shami is bowling exceptionally well. He is fit and we saw in the three Ranji Trophy matches, where he's won Bengal on his own," Ganguly said on Monday.  Shami took 15 wickets for Bengal in the first two Ranji Trophy matches this season. He bowled 91 overs in the three matches, going wicketless in the game against Tripura.

title: Nykaa, Bajaj Auto & more: Top stocks on brokers' radar today
content: Analysts have downgraded Trent, citing weak consumption and competition, while Morgan Stanley maintains an overweight rating on Nykaa, impressed by its beauty and fashion business growth. Goldman Sachs holds a neutral stance on Divis Laboratories, noting strong Q2FY26 performance driven by custom synthesis.

title: Trade talks: Trump says US close to getting 'fair deal' with India; adds a 'love us again' twist
content: US President Donald Trump anticipates a "very different deal" with India, aiming for fair trade after past "unfair" agreements. Union Minister Piyush Goyal confirmed ongoing "very well" discussions on a Bilateral Trade Agreement, acknowledging sensitive issues requiring more time. Both sides indicate progress, despite persistent trade tariff and Russian oil import differences.

title: US budget trim: 'It’s not our role to help govt save money'; Bill Gates on philanthropy
content: The Gates Foundation has pledged a significant $2.5 billion over five years to boost global women's health, focusing heavily on research and development for innovations like self-injectable contraceptives and rapid STI diagnostics.

title: Lakers vs Hornets game preview: Full injury report, player updates, and more
content: The Lakers and Hornets face off on November 10, 2025, with both teams battling significant injury woes. Key players like LeBron James and LaMelo Ball are out, testing team depth. Austin Reaves' potential return offers a boost for the Lakers, while the Hornets rely on emerging talent. Expect a resilient contest driven by effort and opportunity.

title: Trump-Al-Sharaa meeting: US partially waives Caesar Act sanctions — top points
content: Syrian President Ahmad al-Sharaa visited the White House, marking a significant shift as Syria joins the US-led coalition against the Islamic State. The meeting focused on Syria's role in defeating ISIS, reconstruction, and sanctions relief. The US also partially waived Caesar Act sanctions for 180 days, supporting Syria's economic rebuilding efforts.

title: Michael Willis Heard death: How TikTok star Yes King tragically died
content: TikTok sensation Michael Willis Heard, known as 'Yes King,' has passed away. His daughter confirmed the news, remembering him for his uplifting videos promoting self-love and confidence. The Elyria, Ohio native, who also served as a life coach and pastor-like figure, inspired millions with his positive energy. His sudden departure has deeply saddened his global fanbase.

title: Noah Gray earns NFL Salute to Service nod amid Travis Kelce successor buzz
content: Kansas City Chiefs are preparing for life after Travis Kelce, with tight end Noah Gray emerging as a respected leader, recognized for his military support.  While Gray shines off-field, the team also eyes potential future talent like Oregon's Kenyon Sadiq in the upcoming NFL Draft. Gray's dedication is already shaping the Chiefs' next era.

title: Klay Thompson apologises to Megan Thee Stallion after airport mishap
content: Dallas Mavericks star Klay Thompson went viral for his heartfelt apology and remorse after arriving late to pick up girlfriend Megan Thee Stallion from the airport. He presented her with flowers, expressing genuine regret, which fans found "adorably human." The couple's authentic connection continues to charm audiences as they both thrive in their careers.

title: Rank turner? CAB president Sourav Ganguly drops massive hint at Kolkata pitch
content: "Well, they haven't asked for it yet. So, I won't be able to answer the question. It looks a very good one," Ganguly said regarding any requests for a turning wicket. Eden Gardens has hosted two Ranji Trophy matches this season with slower pitches offering minimal help to fast bowlers.

title: High blood sugar? Vegetables of this colour can help improve diabetes control
content: When inflammation sticks around, it tends to increase insulin resistance, nudging the risk of diabetes higher. Deep‑purple vegetables are fortified with anthocyanins, that act as a low‑key shields, softly muting the body’s pro‑inflammatory signals

title: Red Fort blast: Explosion that killed 8 occurred in Hyundai i20 car - what we know so far
content: A devastating blast ripped through a Hyundai i20 near Delhi's Red Fort Metro Station, claiming at least eight lives and injuring 24. Authorities have launched a high-alert across multiple states, with the NIA and NSG investigating the explosion. Prime Minister Modi and home minister Shah are actively monitoring the situation and offering support.

title: Delhi blast: 9 killed; top cop says slow-moving car burst into flames at traffic signal
content: A car blast near Delhi's Red Fort Metro Station on Monday resulted in at least nine fatalities and 24 injuries. The explosion, which also caused a fire damaging nearby vehicles, has prompted a high alert in the capital and across Uttar Pradesh. The cause of the blast remains under investigation.

title: $1 billion lawsuit or apology: Donald Trump warns BBC with ultimatum; sets deadline
content: Donald Trump is threatening the BBC with a $1 billion lawsuit over a Panorama documentary that he claims misrepresented his January 6th speech. His legal team alleges the broadcaster "fabricated" statements by editing his remarks out of context, demanding a retraction and apology by Friday. The controversy has already led to two senior BBC resignations.

title: COP30 kicks off in Brazil, focus on mobilising $1.3 trillion finance
content: COP30 in Brazil has commenced with a primary focus on mobilizing $1.3 trillion annually for developing countries by 2035 to combat the climate crisis. Discussions on the inaugural day centered on setting key agenda points, including climate finance, response to new climate action pledges, and trade measures like the EU's Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism.

title: Delhi blast: US says ‘closely monitoring’ situation after deadly explosion
content: A car explosion near Delhi's Red Fort Metro Station killed at least eight people and injured several others. The blast occurred in a Hyundai i20 at a traffic signal, causing a massive fire that engulfed multiple vehicles. US officials are closely monitoring the situation and offering consular assistance.

title: Delhi blast: Gambhir reacts to Red Fort tragedy - 'Praying for strength'
content: A high-intensity explosion took place on Monday evening when a slow-moving car caught fire near the Red Fort Metro station. Several vehicles were damaged and at least eight people died, officials said. "Saddened by the loss of lives due to the blast in Delhi," Gambhir posted on X.

title: Small plane carrying hurricane aid to Jamaica crashes into Florida pond
content: A small plane carrying hurricane relief supplies to Jamaica crashed into a pond in Coral Springs shortly after taking off from Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport. Initial rescue efforts found no victims, and the operation has now transitioned to recovery. The aircraft was on a humanitarian mission to aid communities devastated by Hurricane Melissa.

title: Dave Portnoy reacts after antisemitic attack in Mississippi; suspect arrested
content: A 20-year-old man, Patrick McClintock, was arrested in Starkville, Mississippi, after a video of him hurling anti-Semitic slurs and coins at Dave Portnoy went viral. Police charged McClintock with disturbing the peace, with potential for enhanced penalties if deemed a hate crime. Portnoy stated he experiences daily antisemitism, highlighting the growing concern.

title: Maharashtra: Pregnant woman, daughter among 4 killed in Vita shop fire
content: A devastating fire, suspected to be caused by an electrical short circuit, claimed the lives of four individuals, including a pregnant woman and her young daughter, in Vita, Sangli. The blaze engulfed an electronics and steel shop, with the victims succumbing to asphyxia from dense smoke. The shop owner, his wife, his pregnant daughter, and granddaughter perished in the incident.

title: Lakers vs Hornets: TV info, lineup, injuries & prediction for Nov 10 clash
content: The Charlotte Hornets will play the Los Angeles Lakers tonight. Both teams have several key players sidelined due to injuries. The Lakers are favored to win despite recent losses. The Hornets are looking to improve their season record. This game is part of the NBA 2025-26 regular season. Fans can watch the match on FDSSE and Fubo.

title: What is the role of a pay commission? | Explained
content: How have public sector compensation systems evolved over decades? When was the first Central Pay Commission constituted? What are the different terms of reference? What are international practices? How can the government attract and retain talent?

title: Voting begins for by-elections to eight Assembly seats across six States, one Union Territory
content: By-elections are being held in Jammu and Kashmir’s Budgam and Nagrota, Rajasthan’s Anta, Jharkhand’s Ghatshila, Telangana’s Jubilee Hills, Punjab’s Tarn Taran, Mizoram’s Dampa, and Odisha’s Nuapada constituencies

title: Jubilee Hills Bypoll: Polling begins on a brisk note
content: The bypoll in the constituency no 61 of Telangana Legislative Assembly has been necessitated due to the death of Bharat Rashtra Samithi MLA Maganti Gopinath

title: Angola agreed to partner with India in ‘critical’ areas during President Murmu's visit: Official
content: He said the discussions reiterated the commitment to "encourage private sector...and private sector (was) playing a big and important role in advancing India, Angola ties of friendship and cooperation"

title: Bihar Assembly elections Phase 2 voting LIVE: Polling underway for final phase
content: In the first phase of polling held for 121 constituencies in 18 districts on November 6, the State had recorded its highest voting percentage ever in history with 64.66% turnout

title: Fisherfolk want better facilities at crematoriums
content: At Odaikuppam near the Ashtalakshmi Temple in Besant Nagar, a resident said that the crematorium had not lights and did not have a proper burning shed.

title: Deputy CM Udhayanidhi Stalin launches scheme to honour senior citizens on behalf of temples
content: Udhayanidhi Stalin also inaugurated 12 dwelling units constructed at a total cost of ₹3.40 crore meant for officials of the Hindu Religious and Charitable Endowments (HR&CE) department.

title: J&K’s by-polls will be a verdict on Omar Abdullah government’s one-year tenure
content: The other factors working against Omar Abdullah in this election are also anti-incumbency and the opposition Peoples Democratic Party’s (PDP) deliberate bid to build its narrative around the government’s failure to deliver in the past one year

title: India airlifts 197 citizens who worked in Myanmar cybercrime hub from Thailand
content: The Indian embassy in Thailand said Thai Prime Minister Anutin Charnvirakul came to Mae Sot to oversee the operation; Mr. Charnvirakul had expressed his government’s determination to stem the cyber fraud centres of Myanmar

title: Probing all angles: Home Minister Amit Shah on Delhi blast
content: “We are investigating from all angles. It is difficult to say what caused the incident,” Amit Shah said

title: Concern raised over proposed 50-MW wind farm near Greater Flamingo Sanctuary in Dhanushkodi
content: Both activists and local fishing community representatives have asked the Tamil Nadu Coastal Zone Management Authority to reconsider CRZ clearance for the project

title: India ready to become self-reliant, future-ready, globally influential by 2047: Abhay Karandikar, Secretary, Department of Science & Technology
content: India is the second largest deployer of 5G over IPv6 in the world and now has a vibrant 6G research ecosystem

title: Houses inundated in Kochi as KWA twin-chamber tank bursts
content: Compound walls collapsed and were washed away as the over four-decade-old tank breached, sending water gushing into nearby houses and damaging household equipment and vehicles; water supply to nearly 30% of areas within Corpn. affected

title: Weekend SIR drive a success as 3,05,780 voters in Ernakulam receive enumeration forms
content: A total of 6,27,009 forms have been distributed in the district till Nov. 9, accounting for 23.63% of the total voters

title: Red Fort blast | ‘Saw people being blown to pieces’: eyewitnesses recount trail of horror
content: Shoppers, taxi drivers and shopkeepers, who helped rescue the wounded and rush them to hospital, recall witnessing body parts and vehicle debris scattered around; our buildings shook, windows rattled, say Chandni Chowk’s residents; so severe was the impact that many felt it over a km away

title: Analysis of candidates of constituencies from Phase 2 of the Bihar Assembly Elections 2025
content: Out of 1,297 candidates analysed by the Association for Democratic Reforms, 415 candidates (32%) have declared criminal cases against themselves

title: Supreme Court refuses to entertain Amritpal Singh’s plea challenging his detention under NSA
content: Amritpal Singh, chief of the ‘Waris Punjab De’ outfit, is currently lodged in jail in Assam’s Dibrugarh along with his nine associates under the National Security Act

title: Rajnath Singh lauds Defence PSUs on acquiring Miniratna status
content: Munitions India Limited (MIL), Armoured Vehicles Nigam Limited (AVNL), India Optel Limited (IOL) and Hindustan Shipyard Limited (HSL) have been conferred with the status

title: Enduring spirit  of ‘Vande Mataram’ serves as a tonic to Indians, says A.P. Chief Minister
content: Claims the nation was proud to have successfully fought the British and for emerging as a global power under the leadership of Prime Minister Narendra Modi

title: Opposition demands probe into Red Fort blast
content: Congress president Mallikarjun Kharge, Rashtriya Janata Dal leader Tejashwi Yadav, Samajwadi Party president Akhilesh Yadav and AIMIM chief Asaduddin Owaisi are among the Opposition leaders who sought a ‘prompt and thorough investigation’ to ‘reassure the public with fair and transparent action’.

title: Madhya Pradesh Cabinet approves hike in Ladli Behna monthly allowance to ₹1,500
content: The increase of ₹250 in the monthly allowance of beneficiaries will cost the State an additional ₹1,793.75 crore for the ongoing financial year 2025-26

title: Final phase polling in 122 seats will decide the fate of 1,302 candidates
content: The final phase is crucial for Jitan Ram Manjhi’s HAM(S) and Upendra Kushwaha’s Rashtriya Lok Morcha (RLM), as these parties contest from their most number of constituencies in it. Besides the fate of 12 Nitish’s Ministers are also going to be decided in this phase. The Grand Alliance parties are involved in ‘friendly’ fights in 11 constituencies.

title: THTalksBengaluru: SoS buttons in aggregator apps to be linked to police command centre
content: ‘We have asked the aggregator apps to tweak their apps to ensure any passenger pressing an SoS button, it will send an alarm to our command centre as well’

title: Local body polls 2025: LDF bank on welfare record to extend 30-year grip over Nedumangad municipality
content: The UDF, which faces intra-party dissidence, is battling to regain lost ground. The BJP, which got two seats in 2010, has since maintained its presence, winning 4 seats each in the 2015, 2020 polls

title: Kerala police steps up security following Delhi blasts
content: Officials said the State police initiated the sweeping security exercise after preliminary investigation pointed to the possible involvement of terrorist groups; they said the police had initiated a high alert level not seen since the Easter Day Blasts in Colombo, Sri Lanka, in 2019

title: NDA is heading for historic victory in Bihar: BJP
content: Tejashwi Yadav is carrying forward his father’s legacy of corruption, misgovernance, and fear, the minister said

title: 2027 U.P. election decisive for saving democracy, says SP chief Akhilesh
content: It was the Samajwadi Party that had stopped the BJP’s growth in Uttar Pradesh; now, the party has the goal of forming a socialist government in 2027, he says

title: DME to take detailed statement of Venu’s wife
content: Venu died at the Thiruvananthapuram MCH while undergoing treatment for heart attack and his voice message alleging lack of medical care went viral

title: Bihar polls: NHRC issues notice to election officials over RJD’s viral election song with minors, promoting caste-based hatred
content: Officials have been asked to provide counselling to the children featured in the video, as well as to their parents or guardians, if required; an Action Taken Report also has been sought by the NHRC within two weeks for its perusal

title: Naveen Patnaik expresses strong displeasure over alleged violation of model code of conduct
content: Ruling party ministers, MLAs were not leaving Nuapada, where bypoll will be held on November 11, although they were legally mandated to do so 36 hours before election

title: J&K Police conduct large-scale crackdown in 10 districts; nearly 100 people detained
content: Jammu & Kashmir Police said the “objective of these operations was to trace and identify individuals involved in subversive activities, monitor suspicious movements, and ensure public safety and order”

title: Congress asks for thorough investigation into Red Fort blast
content: Congress President Kharge has urged the Centre to ensure a prompt investigation into the blast, especially given that it occurred in a high-security zone

title: Punjab, Haryana placed on high alert after Delhi blast
content: Police force has been deployed at sensitive and vulnerable spots, and checking of vehicles and suspicious people has been intensified, the Punjab Police said in a statement

title: Congress flags SIR concerns in Chhattisgarh
content: It says one-month deadline for document submission and verification not sufficient due to paddy harvesting season, demands a three-month window; Bastar-based leader voices concern over tribals lacking proper documents being left out

title: Delhi blast: Security stepped up at Chennai airport
content: Police teams comprising officers and personnel from the 12 police districts of Greater Chennai City are conducting intensive surveillance and vehicle checks at key locations, inspecting suspicious persons and vehicles as part of heightened security measures

title: High-powered panel formed to review functioning of Karnataka prisons
content: Home Minister Parameshwara announced that all prisons in the State would be linked to a central command center at the Prisons Headquarters to monitor CCTV footage in real time

title: Revanth, Messi to kick off Hyderabad’s ‘GOAT’ moment in December
content: Proposed exhibition match likely to be scheduled on December 13, either at the Rajiv Gandhi stadium in Uppal or the Gachibowli stadium

title: Expert panel to look into woman’s death of post-delivery sepsis at SAT
content: Health dept. constitutes panel after the woman’s family, who alleged that she contracted the infection from the hospital, sought an inquiry by an external medical body. SAT has denied the possibility of her getting infected at the hospital

title: We need to create conditions for real, sustainable change: Sri Lankan PM
content: ‘We have been very responsive to governance, we have allowed people to process what we are trying to do, and if there is resistance, we have adjusted,’ says Harini Amarasuriya.

title: Police across Telangana put on high alert after Red Fort blast in Delhi
content: All city police commissioners and district Superintendents of Police were alerted and instructed to deploy Blue Colts and other field units to maintain heightened vigilance

title: ‘Orbit Wallet’ to power ‘smart commuting’ in Electronics City
content: The card integrates transport, shopping, and digital payments into a single platform, offering employees a convenient and tech-driven solution for daily commutes

title: LDF announces candidates for Thiruvananthapuram Corporation polls; Mayor Arya Rajendran not in the fray
content: Candidates for 93 wards declared; eight to be announced later. The CPI(M) will contest in 70 wards, while CPI will field candidates in 17 wards. Thirteen candidates are under the age of 30, while 12 are below 40

title: India-Sri Lanka joint military exercise begins in Belagavi
content: The exercise integrates the employment of drones, counter-unmanned aerial systems and helicopters; joint drills will include securing helipads and conducting casualty evacuation under operational conditions, the Defence Ministry said

title: This bypoll will be a barometer of Congress, BJP and BRS popularity
content: The contest is more between Chief Minister A. Revanth Reddy, BRS working president K. T. Rama Rao and Union Minister G Kishan Reddy than between the contestants

title: V-C refers Sanskrit PhD row to Kerala University Syndicate
content: The Dean has objected to awarding the PhD to the research scholar, who then filed a formal complaint with the V-C alleging caste discrimination. University regulations lack clarity on the procedures to be followed when the Dean and the chairperson of the open defence hold conflicting views and the matter was referred to the V-C. The Syndicate will have the final say

title: Steps taken to ensure water supply after tank collapse in Kochi, says Minister
content: Since the Model Code of Conduct has come into effect with the notification of the local body polls, the Disaster Management Act has been invoked to ensure that ongoing works are not affected, says Minister Roshy Augustine

title: DGP lays foundation for City Training Centre, inaugurates Bharosa and Command Control Centres in Rachakonda
content: Top cop says CTC would enable specialised training programmes for police personnel, particularly in dealing with crimes involving technology

title: Antibiogram 2025 released; AMR shows a slight dip
content: The annual report of 2025 depicts AMR data from January 1 to December 31, 2024, collected from 47 surveillance laboratories from 13 districts which are part of the Kerala Antimicrobial Resistance Surveillance Network

title: Impartiality, effective utilisation must for quick rural development, says panel deputy chief
content: Deputy Chairman of the State Decentralised Planning and Development Committee D.R. Patil chairs a progress review meeting on the District Annual Draft Development Plan in Dharwad

title: Malappuram clinches hat-trick win in Kerala school science fest
content: Malappuram secures 1,548 points to claim the championship for the third consecutive year. Though Palakkad and Kannur record 1,487 points each, Palakkad takes second place on the basis of 17 first prizes it won and Kannur third.

title: Ernakulam all set for polls to 111 local bodies on Dec. 9
content: Elections will be held in 82 grama panchayats, 13 municipalities, 14 block panchayats, one corporation, and one district panchayat in the district

title: Central approval for Thiruvananthapuram metro to take at least a year
content: As the initial alignment has changed, details of land acquisition have to be finalised and a new DPR must be prepared, which will require the State government’s approval first, before it is submitted to the Centre. The priorities of the new government, set to be elected in six months, will have a say in the process

title: Karnataka High Court issues tech-driven SOP for handling cases of minor victims of sexual offences
content: A vital provision of the court’s SOP is the direction to establish Digital POCSO Portal, a secure, cloud-based platform integrated with national systems

title: 12,570 hectares of crops damaged in district, says Prakasam Collector
content: Four-member Central team inspects the flooded paddy fields in Allur, NG Padu and Ommevaram villages, as well as the affected fish ponds in Koppolu and Allur villages

title: Petition in Supreme Court says GenAI in judiciary may lead to fake case laws
content: CJI B.R. Gavai posts the case after two weeks; petitioner urges the top court to formulate a strict policy for regulated use of GenAI in courts until a law was put in place

title: Kochi water tank collapse: special protocol to inspect and fortify ageing structures may be devised following tank collapse
content: While the KWA already has a mechanism to inspect ageing structures, an additional system may be introduced in view of the incident, says Minister for Water Resources

title: Delhi 10/11 Blast: Owner Of Car Linked To Faridabad Terror Network, Say Sources
content: In a stunning revelation, a link has emerged between the blast near Delhi's iconic Red Fort that killed nine people and the "white collar" terror module thatwas busted by the police teams of Haryana and Jammu and Kashmir.

title: Video Shows Suspected Suicide Bomber In Car Before Blast Near Delhi's Red Fort
content: The blast took place at 6.52 near the Red Fort Metro Station in Delhi, leaving mangled bodies and wrecked cars scattered in the busy area.

title: Bihar Votes In Final Round Of Polling, Test For Nitish Kumar's Cabinet: 10 Points
content: The second phase of the assembly election in Bihar began this morning. Polling is being held on 122 assembly seats across multiple districts of the state. A chunk of Chief Minister Nitish Kumar's cabinet is up for polls in this round.

title: Delhi 10/11 Blast: Grief Pours In From Across World, UK And US Issue Advisories
content: Leaders across the globe expressed grief and shock after at least eight people were killed and several others injured in a car blast near the Red Fort in New Delhi.

title: Delhi Bus Conductor Killed In Red Fort Blast. He Was Sole Earner Of Family
content: Ashok Kumar is one of the nine people to have lost life in the car blast near Delhi's Red Fort on Monday evening. Ashok, a native of Uttar Pradesh's Amroha, was the sole earner for his family of eight. Amroha is mourning the loss of its son.

title: Red Fort Blast Live Updates: Amit Shah Calls High-Level Meeting Today
content: Delhi Blast: Nine people are dead and 20 injured after a blast in a car near Red Fort on Monday evening, officials said.

title: Delhi Red Fort Blast In Numbers
content: A powerful explosion near Delhi's Red Fort on Sunday evening sent shockwaves across the national capital. The blast, which triggered a massive fire and damaged multiple vehicles, led to a high alert across the city.

title: Bihar Assembly Election Phase 2 2025 Live Updates: 3.7 Crore Voters To Decide Fate Of 1,302 Candidates
content: Preparations are in full swing for the second and final phase of the Bihar Assembly elections, where 3.7 crore voters will decide the fate of 1,302 candidates across 122 constituencies today.

title: 9 Killed In Blast Near Delhi's Red Fort, Probe Into Terror Links
content: Nine people were killed and 20 injured after a high-intensity explosion ripped through a car with passengers this evening near Delhi's historic Red Fort, one of India's most high-profile spots.

title: Israel Army Chief Urges "Systemic" Probe Into October 7 Attack
content: Israel's military chief called on Monday for a "systemic investigation" into the failures that led to Hamas's October 7, 2023 attack, as the government dragged its feet on establishing a state commission of inquiry on the matter.

title: Israel Bill Allowing Death Penalty For 'Terrorists' Passes First Vote
content: A bill proposing the death penalty for "terrorists" passed a first reading in Israel's parliament on Monday -- a measure that could apply to Palestinians convicted of deadly attacks against Israelis.

title: Trump Threatens $1 Billion Action As BBC Apologises For Edit Error
content: US President Donald Trump threatened the BBC with a billion-dollar lawsuit Monday as the broadcaster apologised  for editing a speech that gave the impression he urged "violent action" ahead of the 2021 assault on the US Capitol.

title: British-Hungarian Writer David Szalay Wins Booker Prize For Novel 'Flesh'
content: Canadian-Hungarian-British writer David Szalay won the Booker Prize for fiction on Monday for "Flesh," the story of an ordinary man's life over several decades in which what isn't on the page is just as important as what is.

title: Trump Says US "Getting Close" To Reaching A "Fair Trade Deal" With India
content: US President Donald Trump said on Monday the United States was getting close to reaching a deal with India that would expand economic and security ties between the two countries, boost US energy exports and promote investments in key US sectors.

title: Trump Says Deal To End US Shutdown Is "Very Good"
content: US President Donald Trump on Monday praised a "very good" compromise deal to end the longest-ever government shutdown, after several Democratic senators broke ranks to join Republicans.

title: 197 Indians Repatriated From Thailand By Special Air Force Flights
content: The Indian Embassy in Thailand shared on Monday that 197 Indian nationals have been repatriated to India from Mae Sot, Thailand, by two special flights operated by the Indian Air Force (IAF).

title: Syrian President Meets Trump At White House
content: President Donald Trump welcomed Syrian President Ahmad al-Sharaa after lifting sanctions imposed on Syria, which had been a pariah state for decades before rebel forces toppled Syrian President Bashar Assad last December.

title: "We Do Not Feel Safe": Family Of Injured Says Red Fort Car Blast Was A Huge Shock
content: The massive car blast near Delhi's Red Fort on Monday evening has not only claimed nine lives but also injured 20 people. Among them are 28-year-old Ankush Sharma and 20-year-old Rahul Kaushik, who were seriously injured.

title: "Top Agencies Investigating Delhi Blast With Full Intensity": Amit Shah
content: Amit Shah has condoled the loss of lives in the high-intensity blast near the iconic Red Fort in Delhi, and informed that the top agencies are investigating the incident with full intensity, and that they will go in-depth into the incident.

title: Complete police verification for passports in 4 weeks: High Court
content: A legal eagle stationed in Sangam city. Has been covering news reports originating out of Allahabad high court for TOI for over a decade. Have reported several landmark judgments, besides the visit of luminaries -- from the PM to CJIs. Read More

title: 5,000 protesters smash past police barricades, storm into Panjab University
content: protesters filled the campus in an assertion of identity CHANDIGARH: a quick U-turn on its plans to restructure the body . it turned into an overwhelming show of strength by thousands of protesters of all hues - farmers, panthic outfits, social groups and the all-India Sikh Students Federation .

title: Gas geyser on, 12yo girl diesfrom fumes a day after b’day

In his free time, he likes to go on bike rides. Before coming to Times of India, Sudeep served for 2 years in India Today Digital as a Sub-Editor at their news desk. Read More

title: NCW seeks penalties under BNS to counter deep fake abuse
content: a new section has been proposed by NCW in BNS to say "modified content means to include the creation, modification, or distribution of digitally created or altered images, videos, or audio that falsely depict any person in an explicit, defamatory, or misleading manner" it has recommended inclusion of cyberbullying, trolling,and privacy violations in the legislation .

title: ED finds Rs 50 crore scam in Kerala co-op bank
content:
ED

ED on Monday said its November 7 searches against board members and directors of Nemom Cooperative Bank in Thiruvananthapuram, associated with some CPM netas, have revealed misappropriation of funds to the tune of over Rs 50 crore, with then office-bearers found involved in forging documents, sanctioning loans beyond permissible limits, diverting funds and overall financial mismanagement, leading to the failure of the bank to honour deposit liabilities.

End of Article

title: Cop among 8 arrested for branding woman 'witch'
content:
.

RAIPUR: A cop, with the help of others, barged into a 53-year-old woman's house, accused her of performing black magic that allegedly caused his wife's death, hurled abuse, thrashed her, pulled her by hair and tried to drag her to a cremation ground in Chhattisgarh's Jashpur Sunday. SI Phoolchand Bhagat and seven others were held Sunday and remanded in judicial custody Monday. Gayatri Bhagat, who allegedly convinced ASI that the woman was responsible for his wife's death, and other accomplices remain at large.

End of Article

content: Swati Deshpande is Senior editor at The Times of India, Mumbai, where she has been covering courts for over a decade. She makes it her job to decipher for the public the truth, be it in an intricate civil dispute or in a gruesome criminal case. Read More

title: Doctors jobless as NEET PG counselling delayed
content: dozens of doctors remain without work as counselling for all-India quota seats has been indefinitely delayed . hospitals, including state-run medical colleges across the country, will remain short-staffed as students haven't joined these hospitals . the medical counselling committee has decided to extend the choice-filling of Round 1 of PG counselling 2025 .

title: Women largest minority, says Supreme Court; to hear plea for immediate quota
content: suprem court agrees to hear a plea seeking immediate implementation of quota for women in legislative bodies . a bench of justices expressed its reluctance to entertain the petition, but finally agreed to examine it . the constitutional amendment cannot be put on hold for an indefinite period .

title: Co-op banks now in e-world with 2 apps
content: home and cooperation minister launches 'Sahkar Digi-Pay' apps . the app is a digital platform enabling quick, paperless, and transparent access to loans and credit for cooperative members across india . he said efforts should be made to establish an urban cooperative bank within next five years in every town .

title: 12 Bihar ministers among 1,302 candidates entering last-lap fight

title: First lead to terror plot came from Jaish posters in Kashmir

title: Notre Dame-Pitt, Texas-Georgia and betting lines for every top-25 team
content: Notre Dame and Pittsburgh will start at noon ET, in a showdown of ranked opponents . Pitt has been the no. 11 passing offense since turning to Mason Heintschel at QB . in the big Ten, Iowa travels to face USC, while the SEC will feature Oklahoma - Alabama and Georgia .

title: Delhi blast: Car ownership trail hints at terror angle; vehicle was sold to ‘Pulwama resident’

title: Data smog engulfs capital as pollution figures go missing

title: Winners and losers: Taylor, Henderson shine; Jefferson, Darnold struggle
content: RB, Indianapolis colts : Jonathan Taylor scored 49.6 fantasy points . he tied for 36th on the all-time single-game list . the rushing score in the fourth quarter rallied his team from behind .

title: Jets' petty post aimed at state of Ohio leads trolls

title: NWSL: Gotham FC dumps KC Current; Spirit advance
content: the semifinalists are the last four league champions: the Orlando Pride , NJ/NY Gotham FC , Portland Thorns and Washington Spirit . the league that practically trademarked chaos outdid itself with two stoppage-time equalizers, three extra-time matches and an upset of the best team in league history .

title: How to watch ESPN amid Disney-YouTube TV blackout
content: the blackout affects ABC, the ESPN networks, the Disney-branded channels, Freeform, the FX networks and the Xfinity network . the conflict affects the channel's ability to carry Disney programming . if you don't have cable access, you can get instant access to ESPN content through a variety of services including Cox, Dish, DirecTV, Fios, Fubo, Hulu + Live TV, Mediacom, Optimum, Sling, Spectrum TV and

title: Free agent pickups: Key additions to fuel your playoff hunt
content: the 10th Sunday of the season began with an exciting overtime affair in Germany . in the late afternoon, the Los Angeles Rams QB Matthew Stafford tossed four TD passes for a record third consecutive game . the team is still waiting for WR Garrett Wilson and Chicago Bears WR DJ Moore to score a fantasy point .

title: Why did the Giants fire head coach Brian Daboll? What's next?
content: the new york Giants are sitting at 2-8 for the third consecutive season . it's the second time this season the Giants blew at least a 10-point lead with under four minutes remaining . daboll is out with an 11-33 record over the past three seasons .

title: Tiering all 32 NFL teams by their playoff chances
content: team strength, injuries, tiebreakers, future strength of schedule and more can shift odds up or down . ESPN analytics writer seth Walder broke down all 32 teams into nine tiers of playoff hopes . the tier is based on information from ESPN's Football Power Index (FPI), betting lines , performance metrics, health status and some instinct .

title: Bobby Marks' NBA Contract Year All-Stars: Reaves, Lakers lead 12-man lineup
content: the 2025-26 season is just three weeks old, and there are more than six months until the start of free agency . the court should not dissuade us from identifying 12 potential free agents who have stood out and what their future could hold with their respective teams . there are criteria to how we selected our lineup of contract-year All-Stars .

title: Man City add to Liverpool woes, Lewandowski lifts Barça,  more
content: man city beat man city 3-0 at the Etihad in the premier league on saturday . a 3-0 win at the etihad showed the best of Jérémy Doku and capped pep Guardiola's 1000th game in glorious fashion . in laLiga, Robert Lewandowski returned to the pitch after injury and led Barcelona to a 4-2 win at Celta Vigo .

title: Cubs mainstay Hendricks retiring after 12 years
content: longtime Chicago Cubs right-hander Kyle Hendricks is retiring after 12 years . he won an ERA title and a world Series championship during his 12-year big league career . the 35-year-old played last season with the los Angeles Angels .

title: 🏈 College Football Power Ranks: 3 newcomers
content: Texas Tech is a legit threat for the college football playoff . but each squad has areas that can be sharpened for the stretch run . even teams much higher in the rankings, such as Oregon and Vanderbilt , came away from narrow wins with areas to clean up .

title: AP Top 25 poll reaction: Houston, Purdue, UConn lead way
content: Purdue entered the season as the no. 1 team over Houston and Florida . the reigning champion Gators fell seven spots to no. 10 . a full week of 2025-26 men's college basketball season is in the books .
